ygData.subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Mesmerisation
ygData.msgSnippet: Really?  If I try to stay back a bit I get the target too far away message.  It seems like I have to be right in on the action to make it work.  Anyone know
ygData.messageBody:
Really? If I try to stay back a bit I get the target too far away
message. It seems like I have to be right in on the action to make it
work. Anyone know what the actual range for it is? (I was testing it in
lake rathe on Aviak Guards, was also hilly where I was if that's a
factor..)
I'm currently fighting mainly in the Preacher room in Perma. (woohoo runed
circlets :) ) The room is pretty small. I don't know how much distance I
can get with it in there. Color Shift/Flux has come in handy in there
though. :)

-Ezrae Dreamstealer
Lvl 23 DE Enchantress
Brell Serilis

On Mon, 20 Mar 2000, Farr, Robert wrote:

.From: "Farr, Robert" <robert.farr@...>
.
.In the countless hours that I have spent in the Avatar of Fear room in Cazic
.Thule, this is the single most used spell. The trick is not to be standing
.close to the critter that you have targetted. I think once you start using
.it from a distance you'll start liking it a LOT more.
.
.Qinie Isil'Goren
.34 Enchanter
.
.> -----Original Message-----
.> From: Jenni [SMTP:freya@...]
.> Sent: Monday, March 20, 2000 3:47 PM
.> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
.> Subject: [eqenchanters] Mesmerisation
.>
.> From: Jenni <freya@...>
.>
.> Hi All!
.>
.> Just how useful is the Mesmerisation spell for you guys? I've found that
.> even with bad pulls I've been able to control things with Enthrall and
.> Charm (been spending a lot of time in permafrost lately). When I use
.> Mesmerisation I get mezzed too, makes me pretty useless to my group when
.> this happens (especially when I scream cancel magic and they don't
.> listen). It helps with the mana involved in large pulls, but is it really
.> worth it to use?
.>
.> -Ezrae Dreamstealer
.> Lvl 23 DE Enchantress
.> Brell Serilis
.>
